blocks.name: tgjustf
blocks.content: Given any function ` F ` , equality of the image by ` F ` is an equivalence relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2023.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: tgjustr
blocks.content: Given any equivalence relation ` R ` , one can define a function ` f ` such that all elements of an equivalence classe of ` R ` have the same image by ` f ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2023.)

blocks.name: tgjustc1
blocks.content: A justification for using distance equality instead of the textbook relation on pairs of points for congruence. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jan-2023.)

blocks.name: tgjustc2
blocks.content: A justification for using distance equality instead of the textbook relation on pairs of points for congruence. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jan-2023.)
